scripts.build:bundle: cross-env ../../node_modules/.bin/mkdirp build && cross-env ../../node_modules/.bin/browserify src/client/index.js -d -t babelify -t browserify-shim > build/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:langs
scripts.watch:bundle: cross-env ../../node_modules/.bin/mkdirp build && cross-env ../../node_modules/.bin/watchify src/client/index.js -d -t babelify -t browserify-shim -o build/bundle.js -v
scripts.watch: npm run build:langs && npm run watch:bundle
